data.title: RADEX Line Fitter
data.name: radex-python
data.description: Python interface for using the software RADEX

evidence: "Python interface for using the software RADEX to fit observed transition lines. It consists of a Python 3 script, `radexfit.py`, which is used with RADEX locally." (single script-style tool, suggesting an end-user application)
"You can check the user guide (`userguide.pdf`) and the example files (inside the `examples` folder) to learn how to use it." (indicates it is run directly by users for a scientific fitting task)

The README only describes cloning/accessing the GitHub repository and using the script with RADEX locally; no mention of package managers, containers, or binaries, implying distribution via the source repository.
